content.en: Efficient join algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the efficiency and speed of join-queries in data processing. These algorithms, such as join synopses, ripple joins, and slice join, are designed to provide faster and more accurate results. They are also being used to optimize result rate on streaming inputs, handle skewed distributions, and perform online aggregation. These advancements aim to enhance the performance of data processing systems and enable near-real-time data warehousing.
content.da: Effektive join-algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre effektiviteten og hastigheden af join-forespørgsler i databehandling. Disse algoritmer, såsom join-synopser, ripple joins og slice join, er designet til at give hurtigere og mere præcise resultater. De bruges også til at optimere resultatfrekvensen på streaming-input, håndtere skæve fordelinger og udføre onlineaggregering. Disse fremskridt har til formål at forbedre ydeevnen af databehandlingssystemer og muliggøre næsten realtids datalagring.
